website_summaries.verdict: The price aside, this breathalyzer is one of the top performing units on the market. It's well worth the extra investment.
pros: Stands out for its user-friendly single button operation and consistently accurate results
cons: The sensors in this breathalyzers need to be recalibrated once a year

customer_reviews.title: I was happy once I hit the
customer_reviews.text: My wife left me, so I thought I would buy this and see how ridiculously drunk I could get in hopes it would heal the pain she caused me. I was happy once I hit the .241 mark
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly  inaccurate. Could be an issue with just this unit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. I got this today. Giving very erratic readings. Difference of almost 100%. I know very much how to use this since I have been using S80 for last two years. My old unit still very accurate. Spoke to Customer support of BacTrac. Very nice gentleman. He suggested to return this amazon and request a new unit. This is going back. Update: Spoke to second gentleman in cust support in BACTrac. Very bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Unni

customer_reviews.title: Wildy inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 20-30 minutes after having a double whiskey I did 3 tests within a 5 minute period and had readings ranging from 0.04 to 0.30. On another occasion I tested my BAC throughout the evening as I consumed alcohol and my readings were always 0.04. This thing isn't even good to use as a novelty item, much less as something you want to rely upon to keep you from getting behind the wheel while intoxicated.
customer_reviews.author: libu1968

customer_reviews.title: Does not work; cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Amazon associate claims this item CANNOT BE RETURNED. Amazon may choose to help you out if it's defective, but evidently it can't be taken back. Right out of the box this does not work. No matter what, it registered 0.000. This is bad both because it is dangerous for this product to be wrong, and also because it claims to be accurate/certified to 0.005, so to get 0.000 after drinking is problematic. I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HoyaSaxa

customer_reviews.title: The newer, the not better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my last BACtrack was getting old. My first one (on the right) was always 100% accurate- I know this because I had an interlock for 18 months and it saved me. Since I got this new one it’s always been significantly higher. The pics above I blew in them at the same time, 2 minutes apart. The old one stayed the same, at the amount of BAC I feel (I’ve been drinking and comparing to blowing for years).
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Not Up To Standards Compared to Previous Generation
customer_reviews.text: Have now gone through 2 of the most recent iteration of the S80 and they have been horribly inaccurate compared to an S80 I have from 2 years ago. After 3 drinks in about 90 minutes, the new S80 with 4 tests is showing a bac of .012. The older version with 742 tests is showing .039. Judge for yourself.... Must be something with the sensor with the newest batch.
customer_reviews.author: Chikinbutt

customer_reviews.title: if you drink regularly, its a really a must ...
customer_reviews.text: if you drink regularly, its a really a must have. Remember this, you can get and impaired driving charge even tho you are under .08% bac. a hundred dollars versus the thousands spent on a dui.... well get my point?
customer_reviews.author: 3shot

customer_reviews.title: Good information
customer_reviews.text: Best friend is an officer and we have done 25-30 comparisons to test this device with a government issue PBT. As long as I follow the devices instructions it is within .01 of the highly expensive top tech police calibrated device. Even though it’s been fairly accurate I am always a skeptic, just get a ride and don’t risk It.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Consistent with standard BAC table
customer_reviews.text: It's readings are consistent with the BAC table for calculating BAC based on amount of alcohol consumed, weight, sex, and time. I just bought it and I hope it will last. I appreciate that you can send it in to get recalibrated. Not sure how much that costs, but will update review. The manual calls for recalibration every 200 blows or every 6 months, (presumably) whichever comes first. You can use this instead of the BAC table if you are unsure of how strong the drinks are. This is an important tool if you are drinking mixed drinks that might be stronger than you expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan A. Jayol

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Our previous breathalyzer took a full minute to be ready to go - sometimes longer. This one is ready to go in less than 15 seconds. It seems to be pretty accurate as long as you heed the instructions and WAIT 10 - 15 minutes after eating or drinking ANYTHING before blowing. My husband blew a .20 about 10 minutes after finishing his last drink one night, then drank water a bit later and blew a .07. (He was still a .09 when he blew about half an hour later after not having anything else to eat or drink.) This is worth the money if you want to make sure you're safe before driving.
customer_reviews.author: smsmoot

customer_reviews.title: Waiting 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it only worked the first 2-3 times. I didn't realize you have to wait 20 minutes with nothing to drink before you use it. Who wants to do that?? I tried several more times and it wouldn't register anything. I called Bac-Trac and they said to return it I had to go thru Amazon, which only had a 30 return policy on it. So Im out of luck and stuck with a non-workable Bac track and a waster of $140. I would not recommend this to anyone. Its junk.
customer_reviews.author: regats

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to reverse denial.
customer_reviews.text: Another way to state an addicts denial is," the addict looses the ability to self evaluate." This tool give a numerical readout that can be used to help one to realize the real degree of impairment.
customer_reviews.author: Shoey

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The California DMV provides a rough estimate of blood alcohol content based on number of drinks, weight, and time elapsed. However, the BAC device I purchased provides seriously inaccurate data, showing for example a 0.05% (technically under the legal limit) when in reality it’s closer to 0.09 - 0.10% (well over the limit). I weigh under 120, so 20 min after drinking 2 drinks there’s no way I’m as low as 0.05%. I did send the device back for return, and was told it was accurate so I couldn’t get refunded - when clearly it is not. I would be putting myself in a dangerous situation if I remotely trusted this device.
customer_reviews.author: dioel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about all these other reviews but this bac reader has worked very well for me and probably saved me from countless amount of trouble. This is my second one. The first still works great and has over 600 uses. I got the second one to do a cross comparison. If it says .000 you are sober lol. Some of the mid range readings can be a little off. But for my use it only tells you .000 when you are totally sober.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money, does not work
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. My friend had a device which cost 25 dollars and seemed to work well. But I was willing to pay more for what I thought was a superior product. The device seems unnecessarily complicated and at the end of the day is totally useless. You blow into it and it displays “FLO” no matter what your BAL A complete waste of money. In my entire life I don’t feel as if I’ve ever been so ripped off as I do by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great personal BAC tester.  Coming from a state prosecutor of 1000’s of DUI’s
customer_reviews.text: This is a great BAC tester for personal use. All tests I did were exactly as they should have been based on amount drank and time. I replaced a Warmhomer brand which thankfully Amazon no longer sells. It was an absolute piece of garbage and waste of money. I feel totally the opposite about the S80 Pro. I don’t quite get the complaints over having to have it calibrated. ALL professional agencies have to have their machines calibrated at least every 6 months or the results are not admissible in court on the basis that the BAC machine is not reliably up to date. I want it recalibrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bactrack in the middle of October 2017 now at the beginning of December 2017 after about 4 uses it reads 00.00 every time. You could be drunk and it still reads 00.00. I don’t recommended due to price and no reliablity.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Worked (I think) one time. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I had three beers at a local establishment, ate and waiting approximately 40 minutes and used it. I registered a .04, which is probably correct. The next time I used it, about three weeks later, I had drank 1 beer an hour over a 5 hour period, then didn't drink for 2 hours. I should have registered zero at that point, but I used it just to see, and I registers a .36. I tried it several times as did others and it continued to register VERY high. I paid $127 and got one use out of it before it stopped working. Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Wade A.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate. Small and easy to use. Perfect to keep in your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly specific and accurate. I experimented with it after drinking 2 glasses of wine, then with 1 glass, without an empty stomach. I have a neighbor who is a police officer, and he agreed that the accuracy was excellent. I absolutely recommend this product to keep in your car. This will potentially save lives, as well as preventing DUIs. An excellent investment
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great BAC tester
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases i've ever made. Bought a few lower end models in the past and wasn't very happy. After ordering this tester I realized what I was missing. Not only does this tester measure to the thousandths place, it also has features to ensure the most accurate measurement possible. If you don't make a seal around the mouthpiece, it lets you know. If you don't blow evenly enough, it lets you know. This is comes in a nice case that travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Recluse

customer_reviews.title: Great pick, stay safe
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time and works if you can withstand eating/drinking or smoking for the 15 mins before you blow to make it accurate. It took me a lot of investigating and research to finally pick this one and I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I had the small unit and decided to get the larger one because I was hoping to get more accuracy. No such luck. This is the third time I've used the unit, I just drank a bottle size glass of wine, and I blew consecutively a 0.00, 0.05, 0.09. 0.02. It's a cute idea, but I'm not sure that the units at the police have are that accurate, these are just toys and I wouldn't want to have to judge whether I was safe to drive based on results that are so insanely inconsistent. Perhaps mine is defective somehow, but judging from the smaller unit that I have from the same company, none of them have any accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a way to know it was accurate or to calibrate it
customer_reviews.text: If this is accurate it will be very handy to have when Im away from the house.... Very easy to use and has different settings. Ive been testing it out around the house so far and always start at 0.00 but I would like to know how accurate it would be to a breathalyzer that an officer would have so that I could have a better feeling of going out and knowing I can trust it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Product defective and non returnable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I read it was the best out there. As soon as I received it, I tested the product after I had a few glasses of wine. It kept displaining the word Flo, which supposedly I was not blowing enough air. After 3 to 5 times it finally gave me a reading. I do not know if it is defective, but in my opinion it is. The worst thing is that it is a product I can not return or exchange through Amazon. I went into other websites where I could had returned it within 30 days. I am really disappointed with Amazon. I am done buying anything from here.
customer_reviews.author: Cia

customer_reviews.title: Worthless product
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased on Sept 18, 2019 and seemed to work for about 15 tests. It now reads a BAC of 000.0% for all tests regardless of the amount of alcohol consumed. I sent an email to service@bactrack.com requesting a Return Authorization (RA) number and didn't receive a response. I called the toll free numbert 877-334-6876 for a RA number and all service reps were busy and was sent to voice mail. Looks like I'm stuck with a "worthless" product.
customer_reviews.author: tomitacat

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work AT ALL and although I just received it, it says this item is NOT eligible for returns for ANY reason! Wth?! All other reviews must be fake. Husband drank 1/2 bottle of wine and it still registered as 0.00
customer_reviews.author: Rose Family

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: We compared this to a police officers Breathalyzer, and it was the exact same reading. It's a very good tool to keep with you in those just in case you feel fine moments. If anyone blows over a .04 (half the legal limit where I live) we don't drive. ( just to give us that extra buffer) It's also fun to prove to your friends how intoxicated they are when they say they are fine! Either way great tool! Just make sure you get it calibrated when it needs to to keep it accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Save your butt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, once the sensor degraded after 3 years, I sent it in to get is calibrated, and instead they sent me a new one. Great product backing, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: I like this device
customer_reviews.text: I like this device. It easily fits in your pocket. It's taught me a lot about myself. I can handle alcohol almost unhumanly. I used to think that meant I wasn't drunk. oh, no, I was SUPER drunk just didn't show the signs....... All that being said this tester isn't something you can use along and along. I find that you have to wait like 20 minutes after a drink for this thing to be accurate. If you blow right after a drink it's still in your mouth. I got like .3 on it once lol and realized this whole having to wait thing. Blew 20 minutes after that beer and it was like .1something.
customer_reviews.author: David Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect it to be 100% accurate, but it works great and it's a good idea to have on hand if drinking to be safe (and it's fun to use with friends at parties too!). You have to wait 30 minutes after your last drink for it to be most accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a piece of mind before operating my vehicle. NEVER use this as a reason to drive if under the legal limit.. BUT if you feel well AND blow under the limit... this is a good tool to know you're OK to drive. Used this thing for 8 years.. still accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that you purchase 2 or 3 of the less ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works very poorly. I've tried to use it a multitude of times (at leat 30 times) and I've have been frustrated by its inabilty to respond when needed. It may be too sensitive to things such as how hard you might blow into the tube, or the moisture in the air or whatever I've gotten no readings from about 80 percent of my attempts. I recommend that you purchase 2 or 3 of the less expensive similar products (just average the result) and you wil be more comfortable and better able to rely on your interpretation of the results.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd horvath

customer_reviews.title: Read the REVIEWS - bad company/product
customer_reviews.text: What a useless product. It worked completely fine for a little und stopped working. Right now I could have 5-6 pints and it would show .00 I'm never trusting this brand or company again. This is a sham and a ripoff device that only works for a certain period of time. I'm filing a consumer report
customer_reviews.author: Young Donnie T

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it never worked. Kept giving me the Flo error. Tried repeatedly and pulled and reinserted the mouthpiece several times. Exhaling lightly or harder didn’t matter. Always got the Flo error. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Fifty

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate. My girlfriend had one margarita with food and it read .16 then she immediately blew again and it was .09 then she immediate blew again and it was back to .16. It read .08 for me after two seltzer’s then I blew again and it was .045. I read and obeyed the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ruehlmann

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life many times, with my interlock in my car.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because I had to have an interlock for a year. I get it off just before Christmas. It works great. Very reliable. I learned 0.03 and below I can still start my car lol. Also great game at parties “guess my BAC!” And also great for that friend that always drives drunk although everyone knows he shouldn’t. I think everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Sadly both the model I received and the replacement that ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly both the model I received and the replacement that I received several weeks later were duds and didn't work. Both Amazon and BACtrack were very helpful in trying to get a replacement/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BACTrack vs BACTrack
customer_reviews.text: An informative review of effortless, observation. Data that I don’t need, but you might. When you have a “why not?” budget..sometimes it leads to experimentation. LONG STORY SHORT Do yourself a favor and go to your local drug store. Spend a fraction of the cost on the rectangle shaped BacTrac - model number eLeVeNtY. (This is not a real model number. Just look for the white, rectangle shaped BacTrack test) Or..buy both, and use this as the negative in your experiment, as it consistently tests /higher/ than the former. (further experimentation proves) ((omg what am I typing?)) Cheers. Enjoy..responsibly. This isn’t “Mad Men.”
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first and now doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: At first this item worked perfectly! I have a breathalyzer in my car and wanted to know when I was safe to drive. Welp today I did 4 shots and I’m still blowing a .00 in this device ....and I know that’s not accurate. I’m so bummed out. I was willing to pay the extra money for an accurate device but it appears after 100 blows this one is off.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bactrack that we personally have purchased; recommended to many friends and associates well. All previous units worked accurately. This new purchase was drastically incorrect in its readings; we compared with other units. Upon contacting customer service we were repeated put off and no help offered. Will not purchase other Bactrack brand nor recommend again. Highly frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Don't Cheap Out
customer_reviews.text: Don't cheap out on a breathalyzer. I did a lot of research before buying this and have been very happy with it. We use it a few times a month, and it seems to work really well. I highly recommend having one if you drink and have a car. Just think about how much cheaper this is than a ticket, wrecking your car, or heaven forbid hurting someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: !!!DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!!!! I HAVE NOT DRANK IN WEEK AND I JUST BLEW IN THIS TO TEST IT OUT AND SAID I BLEW A .24,3. DO NOT BUY. THIS IS TRASH. GIVES FALSE READING. I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bret waelterman

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 3 months. I use it for my teenage sons. I believe it is accurate. I bought it after my 15 year old came home stumping drunk one night. He came home last night, no visible signs of drinking, but he blew a .093. Good for education on how quickly one would have a DUI and not think they were intoxicated.
customer_reviews.author: David DeGhelder

customer_reviews.title: peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is my second S80, we lost the first one. We use it regularly when out, or when we have guests over for drinks. I am very happy with it! I pray it's accurate, seems to be. It's time for re calibration, so we'll see if all the one star reviews are true
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated to operate intoxicated
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy when sober, but add a drunk person to the mix and try explaining: push button, wait for countdown to reach zero (good luck), then blow really hard for 5 seconds (lucky if they can sustain 2 seconds). Then after 10 failed attempts, said apparatus will likely end up being flung across the yard by angry drunk... mission not accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: No mouthpeice
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised it did not arrive with a single mouthpiece-- can't be used upon arrival until the disposable mouthpieces are also obtained?!
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: FAILS AFTER SHORT AMOUNT OF USES
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works great for first 200 uses, after it FAILS. Scam, waste of money, wish I could get a refund but it has been too long. Shame on BACtrack for selling products that they KNOW fail at 200 uses. Read the rest of the reviews, everyone over 200 uses sees the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: John Lipke

customer_reviews.title: I would not bet a DUI on this reading....fun party trick
customer_reviews.text: It's o.k...I bought two...we tried it out on New Year's Eve and the reading varied a lot...one person would try it a few times....some people would get an accurate reading....others would get varied readings that differed greatly....and two guys who were clearly three sheets to the wind, blew under the local DUI limit...which we knew was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnHurlow

customer_reviews.title: The process was pretty easy. I just went on the company website ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this breathalyzer since 2013 and it has worked very well. I recently sent the unit to BACtrack for re-calibration when it wasn't working properly. The process was pretty easy. I just went on the company website and filled out a form to print out and send with the unit. They ended up sending me a brand new one. I couldn't be happier with the breathalyzer and I'm thrilled with BACtrack's customer service. I've recommended this product to friends and I'm so glad to have the piece of mind knowing that myself and loved ones are safe to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Loran

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times and it paid for itself the first time. If you drink this is an item you need. I was surprised on how different drinks effect the BAC. I have called Uber several time as my BAC was too high but I felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this thing, maybe, 10 times since I purchased it in May 2017. It has always been kept indoors and now it suddenly reads nothing but zero. I refuse to send it in and go through what several others have already posted in regards to having their calibration fees refunded and a $40.00 coupon sent to them. Why on Earth would I spend more money on an obviously worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: William B Bradley

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! It is NOT reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Terribly inaccurate. It’ll read zero even after have a drink or read .11 even when I wasn’t drinking for multiple days in a row. Have less than 100 reads. Even tested using my air compressor and it read .14. Complete waste of money. Marketed as high quality item, but can’t be trusted. DO NOT BUY THIS! Other reviews mention that it frequently can’t be recalibrated, but haven’t tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I tested the unit upon receipt. I consumed 1 shot of whiskey at 20 minute intervals for 1 hour. The numbers were very close to the expected value. I am guessung more expensive units would have detected the first shot after 20 minutes. This one did not but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A. Denardo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! It is pure garbage. The unit received was defective and did not work properly. We got FLO errors from the beginning despite using it on different people. The unit would not start consistently and would not exit test mode. Amazon would not allow a return and the company only offered to "calibrate" it on my dime. You can get something that actually works for 1/3 of the price. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great, as long as it's calibrated properly, which I presume it is from the number of websites claiming it's the best. I use is after drinking to make sure I'm not close to the legal limit before. I know that's not the intended use, but I still feel better having some reassurance that I'm well under before getting behind the wheel. The legal limit is 0.08 and I make sure I'm under 0.04 to drive.
customer_reviews.author: JitWit

customer_reviews.title: defective deceptive and misleading
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this item Thinking it’s useful ,but right out the gate the unit is defective. It reads 0.00 regardless of how much u have to drink, very dangerous and horrible. One would think there would be quality control on a item described to be the best one on the market .... it’s made to seem like its equivalent to ones health care professionals use and police officers very very misleading !!!! Amazon say it’s not allowing returns on this item.... idk what’s going to happen awaiting a response as it’s outrageous over $100 and a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Atilla

customer_reviews.title: Stop guessing and have confidence in your decisions
customer_reviews.text: Want to be safe and confident in your actions and decisions then you need this for yourself or a loved one. Never again ask yourself if you are safe. Best for that morning after - you feel ok but you need to know you are legal. Buy it and know you have done the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for fun and to learn how you handle alcohol.
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty accurate. Easy to use. Just blow until you hear the click. I use it mostly for entertainment.It's interesting to see the differences in BAC between multiple people who have drank the same amount. It's also a good idea to know how your body handles and absorbs/breaks down alcohol. I can drink 6 beers in a 4 hour period and barely feel it, while my buddy (similar weight) is obviously intoxicated. I blow 0.067 (Legal to drive) and he blows 0.105.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on other review sites. I wanted something extremely accurate and mostly fool proof. I use this often and am very happy with it. It comes with multiple mouth pieces and a very nice carrying case. Overall, I would recommend this breathalyzer and encourage you to do your research. This is a purchase I do not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa O'Hearn

customer_reviews.title: NO company warranty service
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine for a few months then started an error code "FLO" which meant not blowing in hard enough air. We huffed and puffed ...it was not airflow issue. Contacted BacTRac via email and phone ...no reply for weeks Still waiting need one as we have an alcoholic in our household ...don't buy from this company
customer_reviews.author: roger chang

customer_reviews.title: 2 week lifespan???
customer_reviews.text: The mode button doesn't do anything.... literally nothing..... Though I feel accurate in results un the default mode, it only worked for approximately 2 weeks, and no longer provides any results, no matter the troubleshooting steps. I'm ordering another, just because other reviews are impeccable, but have my doubts. I hope this device doesn't seriously have a 2 week lifespan. I'll revise my review, if for God's sake, the new device works even for one week longer.
customer_reviews.author: rbowen5423

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test my BAC after a night of drinking. I needed it to be accurate so I could know whether or not to call a cab. I'm pretty sure it's accurate but I can't be sure because I have nothing to test it against. Sometimes it seems low but maybe that's because I'm 6'5" 230lbs. In any case, it seems like it's a fine investment if you want to be safe. I gave this 4 stars because you have to send it back every few months to get it re calibrated.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to keep in the car
customer_reviews.text: I keep the S80 in my car. I've have had the opportunity to compare results of this unit to "professional" breathalyzers and it is accurate. I used the unit to track alcohol in my system while sampling over time. Doing that helped me understand generally how long it takes for alcohol to process through my body. That gives me a good gauge for how long I should wait before driving, then I do one final check with the unit to verify, before getting behind the wheel. Keeps me safe, and those around me.
customer_reviews.author: GARY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: I can't rate accuracy.  I worry about how this compares.....
customer_reviews.text: I have this unit. In fact, just sent in for calibration and just got an email that it's on its way back to me. What I wonder is if my BacTrack says .04, for example, would what the police have say the same? I stay scared about how close they are. That said I like it because it's kept me right here in this house when it reports .05 (legal .06 here) but I'm still really, really worry how the readings would compare Better yet, 0 is 0, no matter who is looking at it...working on that in 2020 for the sake of everything. But I love the BacTrack.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We tested ours out the other night. We had several people at different levels of intoxication. It seems to work pretty accurately. However if someone was super drunk, I think it would be hard for them to follow instructions for you to get a reading.
customer_reviews.author: brittany corbn

customer_reviews.title: Accurate peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is the most accurate fuel cell technology, implemented in a minimalist and easy to use package. Battery stays charged for a very long time and this is an indispensable addition to my car's glove compartment. Looking back, the three digit accuracy is a nice touch but not necessary unless used in a no tolerance situation- so perhaps I could have saved a bit on the next model down. The only downside is that this product's instruction manual recommends re-calibration every 6-12 months without any place to mail in the unit, or instructions for how to do this. I'd be worried about accuracy in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to gauge your consumption for a legal level.
customer_reviews.text: We.find this to be a very helpful device. We enjoy craft breweries but were concerned about the alcohol levels. We just had to remember to drink a glass of water and wait 10 minutes for an accurate read.
customer_reviews.author: TinaShopstillshedrops

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do and only needs to be recalibrated annually, which is cheap. Everyone who drinks should have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Koch

customer_reviews.title: Totally Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I got my first one and it worked once. I received a replacement and only half of the digits display. I am going to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: safety first
customer_reviews.text: An incredibly responsible item to have when making decisions whether to drive or how much is too much. I can't actually put a value on such a thing so am simply ecstatic about my BACtrack. This is a security measure that pays off in untold ways. If you're on the fence about purchasing one, I encourage you to get off the fence. It's a no brainer. The product is easy to use, worth the extra, and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wayne Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I gave high stars, but there are a few things to keep in mind. You need to keep this device at a normal temperature. I live in Utah. So I get high cold and hot temperatures. With that said this is spot on. However. If you leave it in your glove box when it’s 100+ degrees outside... you’ll get an inaccurate reading. Same thing with the winter. So if it’s cold or hot. This thing is useless. But if you take care of it and understand the caveats it’s a solid device.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, stopped working within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the BAC S80 for a month and have used it a couple of times. It is now malfunctioning reading OUT every time I try to use it. Looks like I may need to pay $25 to get it recalibrated. I really thought this unit would be better than this. Can’t vouch for the reliabilty because it worked for such a short time. I’m a little frustrated at the cost and the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality device
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several breath analyzers over time. This is the best one by far. Easy to use. Accurate. Comes complete with carrying case and supplies. I wish I had discovered it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Man

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure it works
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure it works although it has some conflicting readings. I live in a country where the legal BAC is .03 so I make sure it’s 0 before I consider getting behind the wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Me

customer_reviews.title: Manufacture will not provide customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two of these. They both broke within six months and I have not had any success contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Munsell

customer_reviews.title: Fun drinking games come from this.
customer_reviews.text: Fun to pull out at a party to see who’s the most intoxicated. Cop friend of mine said he believes it’s pretty accurate. Doesn’t mean I’m gonna jump in the car and drive if it shows I’m under the legal limit .
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: Mine don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this breathalyzer for its accuracy but it seems to be way off. I drank 1-16oz beer and it blew 0.00. I drank 5 beers in 1 hour and it said .07. I probably just got a bad one but who knows
customer_reviews.author: Brandon or Tiffany Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It's a great breathalyzer..quick, compact, fun, useful.
customer_reviews.text: After a few friends have gotten DUI's, I decided this would be a good thing to have. It is ready very quickly, seems well made, and is the size of small cell phone. It comes in a nice padded case that you don't worry about it getting damaged. I would advise that folks who are thinking they'll dispose mouthpieces after a few uses and are going to buy a bag of extras..to wait. It doesn't seem very well advertised - at least when I purchased, that these things are dishwasher safe...I find I am still using the original. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Walleye Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate, no response from company
customer_reviews.text: We really needed this product to deal with some issues at home. It is not accurate at all. First time we used it, the person register .4 - Well, that is comatose state. Person had been drinking, but not for over 2 hours. Tried to reach out to the company. No phone number to call so had to send an email. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stone

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I believe the reviews that it is accurate based on its testing. I'll use it, get a number...let someone in my car use it. They give it back to me and I'll hit the same number on my retest. That seems pretty solid to me that you can re-test it and keep getting the same BAC. It's not randomly jumping around from use to use. Built well, feels solid, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudo Random

customer_reviews.title: I believe it is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing my BAC for decades. This tester registers considerably higher. On the order of 0.02 higher. I know it has excellent reviews. I bought it because of those excellent reviews. I'm sorry that I did. It does not qualify for Amazon returns, so I contacted the manufacturer. I returned it to them and they tested it and said -- "nope, it's fine." I suppose it's possible my previous testers were inaccurate. But, I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Mareda

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your teenager!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have this! Face it teenagers do stupid things I have 2 DUIs now but a clean record for 7 years and I've kept my buddies from doing stupid things thanks to this exact device, have 2 now and highly recommend you buy one. It never hurts to know where you're at, we all digest alcohol differently.
customer_reviews.author: dan wala

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: If you like to have a couple drinks while your out, not a bad idea at all. I've used it several times and very happy if I need to uber.
customer_reviews.author: A D J

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box poor reliability
customer_reviews.text: Item defective out of the box.It was difficult to start, the mode bottom didn’t do anything, battery were full.BAC would not refund me, only amazon did in full and I trash the item(no need to return). This item have several negative comments.I will no buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: gaetan guimond

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after 4 months - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after 4 months. NOT WORTH THE MONEY! Now when I try to turn it on, the screen flashes a couple times and then nothing. I'm so disappointed in the produce, especially after spending $120. I will add a video of the product not working soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use with friends
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have to see where you're at BAC wise before you decide you're okay to drive. Usually ends up becoming a "who's the most drunk" game.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rink

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and seems to be built pretty solidly
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and seems to be built pretty solidly. The mouthpiece doesn't seem to fit in very well; you put it in and it doesn't seat or click or anything. It kind of feels like it is wedged in a bit wrong, but whatever, I guess. It seems pretty accurate. I'd feel a lot more confident using this than one of the keychain types.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Face

customer_reviews.title: If you need it to stay out of jail, then just uber it.
customer_reviews.text: it is awesome and very accurate. It does state after 200 blows it should be calibrated. It is worth the money if you use it first.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Landry

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This device is much better built than some other $70 one I had that lasted 6 months. The quality is far better and it’s very simple to use. To the people that gave it low rating, I think it’s operator error. Calibration required! But who cares. That’s how some sensors work. Don’t you want a product like this to maintain it accuracy? I sure know I do. I recommend this one very much. I only have had one other one but I’d get this one over that one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I feel so good that from now on
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday, so I might have to update this! Today, when trying to figure out when to calibrate the system, I found these videos, Dr. Phil's recommendations and tests, which solidifies my decision to purchase this system (and they are even reviewing the older model): [...] $130 won't even get your car out of impound if you do get a DUI, it's a hellofan investment!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G

customer_reviews.title: It does not work and might endanger your family
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly inaccurate and dangerously wrong. How dare Amazon sell this and refuse to honor their return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for a couple of months then needed recalibrated. Had to pay and send off to recalibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my first S80 BAC for 2 1/2 years, works great. I decided to get another one since the first one did very well. Safety first!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with this purchase. It is small, efficient and a safe way to be careful and judge if it is oik to drive. Especially to test the morning after a night out. That is when we "think" we are okay, but the police officer may have a different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't got a DUI since I bought it. Turns out some temps will show up drunk on a monday morning. MONDAY MORNING! It's not like I called them in on a saturday!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Nevergold

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of use. I have a breathalyzer install in my truck and the bactrak unit reads a little higher than the one installed in my truck. Which is good in my opinion. Once the bactrak reads the legal limit you know you are good to drive. Comes with plenty of extra mouthpieces. Carrying case is a plus also.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Womack

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, battery life is ok, no issues with it. You need to blow hard and for a while to get proper readings.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: not working after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this item when we received it, however, 2 months into having it now it does not read at all. it gives a 0.00 reading after blowing into the machine. Very disappointed with this product after spending almost 4130 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelise Berrios

customer_reviews.title: not sure it works...
customer_reviews.text: was using it for weeks on family and friends and loving it, but then used it on those who had been admittedly drinking and it gave varied and what seemed to be inaccurate responses
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: This product is the worst!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a while and was accurate. But then one day decided it would not work. I changed batteries.....no luck. Then tried to open the case...I.e. brains of the operation...,cannot open it Don’t waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: BACtrack S80 Breathalyzer | Professional-Grade Accuracy | DOT & NHTSA Approved | FDA 510(k) Cleared | Portable Breath Alcohol Tester for Personal & Professional Use
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1Powered by BACtrack's largest Xtend Platinum Fuel Cell Sensor, the BACtrack S80 Professional Breathalyzer is the most accurate breathalyzer in the BACtrack family, delivering reliable BAC results, with police-grade accuracy. From being used as an alcohol detector for employees in businesses, to acting as an alcohol tester for patients in clinics or treatment centers, the S80 is perfect for a variety of professional alcohol sensing, detecting and testing applications. And because of its reliability and portable design, it's also great as a personal BAC breathalyzer. Help friends and family make better decisions while drinking with the accurate and affordable BACtrack S80 alcohol Breathalyzer.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
877-334-6876
feature_bullets: #1 RATED BREATHALYZER BY WIRECUTTER - "After 65 hours of research, which included getting intoxicated at a police station to test personal breathalyzers alongside law enforcement equipment, we're sure the BACtrack S80 is the most accurate, reliable, and easiest-to-use personal breathalyzer that you can buy." - TheWirecutter, February 2017

PRACTICAL & EASY TO USE - Blow for 5 seconds and your BAC results are displayed 10 seconds later on a bright, easy to read LCD screen. Alcohol tester breathalyzer AA battery powered, comes with 6 reusable mouthpieces. Wait 15 minutes after consuming alcohol for the most accurate result.

THE MOST ACCURATE BREATHALYZER AVAILABLE - In your efforts to drive more responsibly you need the most accurate results. While some breath testers give inconsistent readings and leave you wondering what your true BAC reading is, BACtrack breathalyzers will always give you police grade accuracy.

ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Designed to read thousands of times with accurate results every time. When used correctly, testing 15 minutes after eating or drinking, BACtrack will last for years. All BACtracks also come with a full one year warranty, should any issues arise.

DOT APPROVED IN ALL 50 STATES - FDA 510(k) CLEARED - A portable alcohol tester designed to surpass the most rigorous standards of expert alcohol screeners, from roadside law enforcement to hospital and treatment professionals. Response Time 3 Seconds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
